comment: чек Perception на мертвых культистах, пытавшихся схватить Паскаля. Успех

languages.text: Сноровка, с которой действовали фальшивые "калеки", заставляет предположить в них опытных бойцов, лишь прикидывавшихся мятежниками.
Not only were they able-bodied all along, but their skilful actions also suggest that they were seasoned fighters merely posing as insurgents.
languages.original_text: Сноровка, с которой действовали фальшивые "калеки", заставляет предположить в них опытных бойцов, лишь прикидывавшихся мятежниками.

traits.locale_text: Not only were they able-bodied all along, but the deftness of their actions also suggests they were seasoned fighters who'd merely posed as insurgents.
Not only were they able-bodied all along, but the deftness of their actions also suggests they were seasoned fighters who'd merely posed as insurgents.
Not only were they able-bodied all along, but their skilful actions also suggest that they were seasoned fighters merely posing as insurgents.
Not only were they able-bodied all along, but their skilful actions also suggest that they were seasoned fighters merely posing as insurgents.
Not only were they able-bodied all along, but their skilful actions also suggest that they were seasoned fighters merely posing as insurgents.
Not only were they able-bodied all along, but their skilful actions also suggest that they were seasoned fighters merely posing as insurgents.

languages.text: Sie waren nicht nur die ganze Zeit über völlig gesund, ihr geschicktes Vorgehen lässt auch vermuten, dass sie erfahrene Kämpfer waren, die sich nur als Aufständische ausgegeben haben.
languages.original_text: Not only were they able-bodied all along, but their skilful actions also suggest that they were seasoned fighters merely posing as insurgents.

traits.locale_text: Sie waren nicht nur die ganze Zeit über völlig gesund, ihr geschicktes Vorgehen lässt auch vermuten, dass sie erfahrene Kämpfer waren, die sich nur als Aufständische ausgegeben haben.

languages.text: Non seulement ils étaient tout ce qu'il y a de plus valides, mais c'était aussi carrément des combattants aguerris.
languages.original_text: Not only were they able-bodied all along, but their skilful actions also suggest that they were seasoned fighters merely posing as insurgents.

traits.locale_text: Non seulement ils étaient tout ce qu'il y a de plus valides, mais c'était aussi carrément des combattants aguerris.

languages.text: 这些人不仅身体健全，而且动作娴熟。这表明他们都是经验丰富的战士，只不过伪装成了叛乱分子的样子。
languages.original_text: Not only were they able-bodied all along, but their skilful actions also suggest that they were seasoned fighters merely posing as insurgents.

traits.locale_text: 这些人不仅身体健全，而且动作娴熟。这表明他们都是经验丰富的战士，只不过伪装成了叛乱分子的样子。

languages.text: 彼らは初めから健常者であっただけでなく、その行動の巧みさからも、反乱軍を装っただけの熟練した戦闘員であったことがうかがえる。
languages.original_text: Not only were they able-bodied all along, but their skilful actions also suggest that they were seasoned fighters merely posing as insurgents.

traits.locale_text: 彼らは、ずっと健康体であっただけでなく、その行動の巧みさからも、反乱軍を装っただけの熟練した戦闘員であったことがうかがえる。

languages.text: No solo estaban sanos todo el tiempo, sino que sus hábiles acciones también indican que eran guerreros experimentados que se hacían pasar por insurgentes.
languages.original_text: Not only were they able-bodied all along, but their skilful actions also suggest that they were seasoned fighters merely posing as insurgents.

traits.locale_text: No solo estaban sanos todo el tiempo, sino que sus hábiles acciones también indican que eran guerreros experimentados que se hacían pasar por insurgentes.

languages.text: Başından beri güçlerin kuvvetlerinin yerinde olmasının yanı sıra sergiledikleri ustaca hareketler de bu grubun asi kılığına girmiş deneyimli savaşçılar olduğunun delili.
languages.original_text: Not only were they able-bodied all along, but their skilful actions also suggest that they were seasoned fighters merely posing as insurgents.

traits.locale_text: Başından beri güçleri gayet de yetiyormuş, üstelik çıkardıkları işe bakılırsa yalnızca asi kılığına girmiş deneyimli savaşçılarmış.
